name: Orun
appearance: Weather-cut runner with glass-burn scars on both forearms, hair bleached near-white by caldera fumes, eyes always tracking the sky’s veins.
character: Dogged and fatalistic, laughs at danger, haunted by oaths spoken under thunder.
talents: feels ground-fire rumble seconds before it breaks
throws a hook dead true in gale
bargains with rival crews without blood
dreams: Earn the right to name a crack on the Highest Spire
Found a neutral runner’s lodge that outlasts house wars
secrets: Broke an oath in earshot of a strike and coughed glass for a week; hides the shards in his belt
Took coin to delay a storm run; a rival crew died in the attempt
